sql-statements.statement: select distinct org_internal_id, name_primary from Org_Category, Org where Org.owner_org_id = ? and Org_Category.parent_id = Org.org_internal_id and ltrim(rtrim(upper(Org_Category.member_name))) in ('PRACTICE') order by name_primary

select distinct org_internal_id, name_primary from Org_Category, Org where Org.owner_org_id = ? and Org_Category.parent_id = Org.org_internal_id and ltrim(rtrim(upper(Org_Category.member_name))) in ('CLINIC','HOSPITAL','FACILITY/SITE','PRACTICE') order by name_primary

select distinct org_internal_id, name_primary from Org_Category, Org where Org.owner_org_id = ? and Org_Category.parent_id = Org.org_internal_id and ltrim(rtrim(upper(Org_Category.member_name))) in ('PRACTICE') order by name_primary

select distinct org_internal_id, name_primary from Org_Category, Org where Org.owner_org_id = ? and Org_Category.parent_id = Org.org_internal_id and ltrim(rtrim(upper(Org_Category.member_name))) in ('PRACTICE', 'CLINIC','FACILITY/SITE','DIAGNOSTIC SERVICES', 'DEPARTMENT', 'HOSPITAL', 'THERAPEUTIC SERVICES') order by name_primary
